app.name: SleepyBabyy
app.description: Track, understand, and improve your baby's sleep patterns with gentle guidance designed for real parents.

hero.title: Better sleep for
hero.subtitle: Track, understand, and improve your baby's sleep patterns with gentle guidance designed for real parents.
hero.subtitleExtra: You've got this, and we've got you.

tutorial.title: Getting Started with SleepyBaby
tutorial.subtitle: Learn how to track, understand, and improve your baby's sleep patterns with our step-by-step guide.

setup.title: Account Setup
setup.description: Create your account and set up your first baby profile
setup.step1: Sign up for your free SleepyBaby account using your email address
setup.step2: Verify your email and complete your profile information
setup.step3: Create your first baby profile with name and birth date
setup.step4: Familiarize yourself with the dashboard layout and main features

tracking.title: Activity Tracking
tracking.description: Learn how to log sleep, feeding, and diaper activities
tracking.step1: Start a live sleep session or log sleep manually with start/end times
tracking.step2: Record feeding sessions including type (breast/formula) and duration
tracking.step3: Track diaper changes with contents (wet/soiled) and notes
tracking.step4: Add custom activities like tummy time, bath time, or play sessions

reports.title: Reports & Analytics
reports.description: Understand your baby's patterns through charts and insights
reports.step1: View daily sleep summaries and total hours slept per day
reports.step2: Analyze feeding patterns and frequency over time
reports.step3: Use date range filters to view data for specific periods
reports.step4: Identify trends and patterns to optimize your baby's routine

advanced.title: Advanced Features
advanced.description: Explore sleep schedules, sounds, and family sharing
advanced.step1: Create personalized sleep schedules based on your baby's age
advanced.step2: Use our sound library with white noise and lullabies
advanced.step3: Invite family members to collaborate on tracking
advanced.step4: Set up notifications and customize your experience

features.title: Everything you need for better sleep
features.subtitle: Designed by sleep experts and parents who understand the challenges of sleepless nights.

trackEverything.title: Track everything
trackEverything.description: Log sleep times, wake-ups, and patterns effortlessly. Get a complete picture of your baby's sleep journey with just a few taps.

customSchedules.title: Custom sleep schedules
customSchedules.description: Create flexible, age-appropriate schedules that adapt to your baby's natural rhythms. No rigid rules - just gentle guidance.

soothingSounds.title: Soothing sounds & guidance
soothingSounds.description: Access our library of calming sounds and expert-backed sleep tips. Help your little one drift off peacefully, every time.

multiCaregiver.title: Multi-caregiver support
multiCaregiver.description: Share access with partners, grandparents, or caregivers. Everyone stays updated and no sleep detail gets missed.

insights.title: Sleep insights & analytics
insights.description: Discover patterns with beautiful charts and trends. Make informed decisions about your baby's sleep with data-driven insights.

multilingual.title: Available in 8 languages
multilingual.description: Use SleepyBabyy in English, German, Swedish, Spanish, French, Italian, Greek, and Finnish for a comfortable experience in your native language.

sleepSchedule.title: Personalized Sleep Schedule
sleepSchedule.subtitle: Create and manage sleep schedules tailored to your baby's needs.
sleepSchedule.noProfileMessage: Please select or create a baby profile to use the sleep schedule feature.

trackActivity.title: Track Activities
trackActivity.subtitle: Tracking {{name}}'s activities today
trackActivity.selectProfileMessage: Please select or create a baby profile to start tracking activities.

familySharing.title: Family Sharing
familySharing.subtitle: Invite family members and caregivers to help track activities and view reports
familySharing.setupMessage: You need to create a baby profile before you can share access with family members.
familySharing.inviteMessage: Invite family members and caregivers to help track {{name}}'s activities and view reports.

sounds.title: Soothing Sounds & Audio
sounds.subtitle: Choose from our library of calming sounds and helpful sleep guidance for your baby.

reports.title: View Reports
reports.subtitle: Analyze sleep and activity patterns to understand your baby's routines.
reports.createProfileMessage: Create a baby profile to start tracking and viewing reports.

sleepSchedule.childAgeHelper: Please enter your child's age in months
sleepSchedule.childAgeCalculated: Calculated from birth date (you can adjust if needed)
sleepSchedule.napFrequency: How many naps does your child currently take?
sleepSchedule.createFirstSchedule: Create your first personalized schedule above!

sounds.chooseTimer: Choose how long the audio will play before automatically stopping.

sleepTracker.title: Sleep Tracking
sleepTracker.notesPlaceholder: How was the sleep? Any observations...

feedingTracker.notesPlaceholder: How was the feeding? Any observations...

diaperTracker.title: Diaper Change
diaperTracker.notesPlaceholder: Any observations about the diaper change...

customActivityTracker.title: Custom Activities
customActivityTracker.notesPlaceholder: How was the activity? Any observations...

babyProfileSetup.title: Create Baby Profile
babyProfileSetup.subtitle: Create a profile to start tracking activities

dashboard.subtitle: Ready to track your baby's sleep patterns and activities today?
dashboard.noDataMessage: Start tracking {{name}}'s activities to see insights and patterns here.
dashboard.noProfileMessage: Create a child profile to see personalized insights
dashboard.pediatricianReportsDesc: Generate professional reports for healthcare providers

notifications.title: Smart Notifications
notifications.subtitle: Set up intelligent reminders and alerts for your baby's routine
notifications.enablePrompt: Get smart reminders for feeding, sleep, and important milestones.
notifications.blocked: Notifications are blocked in your browser
notifications.notSupported: Notifications are not supported in your browser
notifications.feedingRemindersDesc: Get notified when it's time for your baby's next feeding based on your set intervals
notifications.sleepRemindersDesc: Receive age-appropriate sleep suggestions for naps and bedtime
notifications.milestoneRemindersDesc: Get alerts about important developmental milestones and checkup reminders
notifications.patternAlertsDesc: Receive notifications about unusual patterns or changes in your baby's routine

footer.tagline: Helping families get the rest they deserve, one night at a time.
